full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Details

* **Tender Name:** EN862-222422 - Office Furniture RFSO
* **Reference Number:** WS3626645382-Doc3695806391
* **Amendment Number:** 11
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-05
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-19T14:00:00
	+ **Note:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2022-12-19 by 2:00pm EST.
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-03-31
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Goods and Services:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) requires up to 17 Standing Offers for the supply, delivery and installation of office furniture within the National Capital Region.

## Description
The Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is for the supply, delivery and installation of office furniture, on an as-and-when requested basis, within the National Capital Region.

## Eligibility
This tender is open to all qualified vendors.

## Selection Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is open to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contact Information

* **Name:** Michelle Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not Available
* **Fax:** Not Available
* **Address:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Region:** National Capital Region (NCR)
